I'v Burned them with "Alcohol 120%" in 8X, it's not too much data.. then I used a Low Speed And Worked Good For Me ... Awnsers In Order
  1- Extract them using winrar, when Extracted You will find a .ISO File, then Burn OPENING the iso in ( alcohol 120%, Dvd Decrypter, Nero Burning Rom),
  2- This is a Ps2 Game no Psone ( Is a Ps2 CD native game ) and require a Modded Ps2 , I DON'T test on "Hdloader, swap magic, or USB-advance" if works I don't know... and there are many Ps2 Games Produced In cd by default ( ICO, Street Fighter Ex 3, Okage Shadow King and others I don't Remember )) ... 

Remember ... "Don't Burn a data disk with the iso File in it... Open the file with a burning program !"
